Package battlesys

Class Summary
BattleRecord Recording the complete course of battle and draw, save and upload the line graph
CompleteMoveResult A complete move result, consists of list of individual move results and a result string.
Main The main function for BattleSys - Nth battle.
Move Generic move class - The root of the Move Hirerachy.
MoveAbilitySplit Move that splits ability between attacker and defender
MoveAbilitySwap Move that swaps ability between attacker and defender
MoveChangeAbility Moves that solely changes ability
MoveChangeAbilityAttack Move that changes or absorbs ability in addition to normal attack
MoveNormal Class for normal move - moves that do direct attacks Damage way can be modified through changing the parameters
MoveRandom Move that make other moves at random.
MoveStatus For moves that are attacking and also inflict status to the target.
MoveTransferStatus Moves that transfer all bad status of oneself to the target
Player Class for storing general data and moves for a player TODO implements Serializable...
PlayerBattleRecord Records how a player plays the battles, that is, number of wins, loses, draws, etc...
PlayerList A List of Players, with numerous more functions specific for a list of players
RandomEventResult Immutable class stores a result of the random event phase
SingleBattleResult Class storing the result of a single battle
SingleMoveResult Records results of a move.
Tournament Methods for running a round-robin tournament
Utility Storing some static useful functions
 

Enum Summary
Player.statusId Id for uniquely identifying all the statuses, used to tell whether a player has a certain status inflicted, etc...
